title: Router Alias Alignment in main.py
description: Fixed router import mismatches in main.py by aligning all router includes to use proper import aliases

changes.details: Changed direct imports to use proper router alias format
Updated app.include_router calls to use proper aliases instead of module.router pattern

impact: Improved code consistency and reduced potential for import errors during deployment
